channel.title: I have alot of problems with it. Can anyone help me?
channel.description:
Ok let me explain my problems...
First of all, I can only play it if I start my own server... I cant log onto somone else's, it just says something like "error, the server must be down, try pressing cancel and starting your own server" and that even happens when I DO start my own server...
and some other problems...
I cannot smelt any ores, when i click on the furnace nothing happens.. and at some doors, like the one in barbarian village with the spinning wheel in it, nothing happens there either. I just stand there doing nothing. and sometimes i cant drop stuff. AND... when i first started out i had a bronze pick.. but i mined 2 iron and my pick dissappeared!
and also... sometimes, When i log onto the same account i've been using, it reset's my whole account. meaning i have to start over and get the items again and whatever...
also.. i've heard people talking about "editing mopar" im new to it and all, you can edit your servers? how? :confused: :|
-thanks for all help! ~mojo~ :cool:

item.title: I have alot of problems with it. Can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @Mackrack360_Racer_D Mackrack360 + Racer D
item.description:
@Mackrack360_Racer_D wrote:

You need to get the latest version of java for that. Because of mining n stuff you have to edit your client.java, Check in the tutorial section for one

Read full topic
item.source: I have alot of problems with it. Can anyone help me?

item.title: I have alot of problems with it. Can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @mojobo1 mojobo1
item.description:
@mojobo1 wrote:

ok, i see your point… but i CANT join any servers besides the one i start. i cant. it doesnt work at all.

Read full topic
item.source: I have alot of problems with it. Can anyone help me?

item.title: I have alot of problems with it. Can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I suggest playing some servers for a small amount of time. Get to know their flaws and such, then you can think about creating a server/modifying a server.

I suggest you go to the RS2 Server Advertisement section and look for some servers to join.

Read full topic
